summary: This is an email from Assistant United States Attorney Andrew to defense counsel in the case US v. Maxwell, transmitting a letter regarding categories of co-conspirator statements. It is formal legal correspondence from the prosecution to the defense team.

events.title: Prosecution Letter on Co-Conspirator Statements

locations.context: Office address of the Assistant United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is an email from AUSA Andrew to the defense counsel in US v. Maxwell, dated November 5, 2021.
The email transmits an attached letter (dated November 4, 2021) regarding 'categories of co-conspirator statements,' indicating ongoing pre-trial legal discussions.
The defense team includes Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, Bobbi C Sternheim, and Jeff Pagliuca.
The correspondence is formal, from the prosecution to the defense, regarding evidentiary or procedural matters in the Maxwell case.
The sender's address is the Southern District of New York U.S. Attorney's Office at 1 Saint Andrews Plaza.
